1.0.name: wordpress/my-geo-posts-free
1.0.description:
This plugin will save location data in visitors browser cookies. First time when visitor visits the site, plugin will automatically save geo location data to cookie and redirect back to same page to parse all geo location shortcodes in wordpress site.

How to use My GEO Post Free Plugin ?

Use following shortcodes almost anywhere in WordPress, ie. Title/Content of WordPress post/page/widget etc.. Within a title or within a content itself, just copy paste following shortcodes.

  • [mygeo_city] // to display City name
  • [mygeo_country_code] // to display Country Code
  • [mygeo_country_name] // to display Country Name
  • [mygeo_region] // to display state / region code
  • [mygeo_region_name] // to display state / region name
  • [mygeo_latitude] // to display latitude of the visitors location
  • [mygeo_longitude] // to display long
